    • removeLine

      Hologram removeLine(int index) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Removes line at the given index.
      Parameters:
      index - - Index.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if there is on such line.

    • setLine

      Sets string at provided index.
      Parameters:
      index - - Index.
      line - - String.

    • clear

      Hologram clear()
      Clears the hologram lines, does not update them.

    • setPersistent

      Hologram setPersistent(boolean persistent)
      If hologram is persistent it will not be removed when far away.
      Parameters:
      persistent - - flag.

    • isPersistent

      boolean isPersistent()
      Returns true if hologram is persistent. Persistent holograms are not automatically removed when far away. Though minecraft will un render them still, the custom range will not remove them.
      Returns:
      true if hologram is persistent.

    • setRemoveWhenFarAway

      Hologram setRemoveWhenFarAway(int hideWhenFurtherThan)
      Sets the range for which the hologram will be removed.
      Parameters:
      hideWhenFurtherThan - - Range.

    • getRemoveWhenFarAway

      int getRemoveWhenFarAway()
      Returns the range from which the hologram will be removed.
      Returns:
      range.

    • isShowingTo

      boolean isShowingTo(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Returns true if hologram is showing to the player.
      Parameters:
      player - - Player.
      Returns:
      true if hologram is showing to the player.

    • getLocation

      org.bukkit.Location getLocation()
      Return actual location of the hologram.
      Returns:
      actual location of the hologram.

      Removes the hologram.

      Parameters:
      flag - true -> hide, false -> destroy

    • updateLines

      Hologram updateLines(boolean keepListSorted)
      Updates the hologram lines.
      Parameters:
      keepListSorted - - If true, the list will be sorted bottom top to top.

    • updateLines

      Hologram updateLines()
      Updates the hologram lines. The list will be sorted from top to bottom. (Default)

    • create

      Hologram create(org.bukkit.Location location)
      Creates a new hologram at the provided location.
      Parameters:
      location - - Location.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if hologram already exists.

    • move
